name: customer_journey_evaluation
description: Test the complete customer journey from homepage discovery to contact form submission

steps.expected: Homepage should load without errors and display professional design with electrician service information
Should display testimonials section with 3+ customer reviews showing names, locations, and detailed feedback
Services page should load at /services and display transparent pricing for electrical services
Should display specific pricing amounts for services like electrical repairs, installations, inspections with dollar values
Contact form should be visible on homepage with name, email, phone, and message fields prominently displayed

steps.action: Fill form fields: name 'John Doe', email 'john@test.com', phone '555-123-4567', message 'Test message'
steps.expected: Form should accept input for all required fields without validation errors
